name: badger
title: Badger
description: Dock notifications in the menu bar.
author: robbiehobby

commands.name: badges
commands.title: Configure Badges
commands.description: Manage badges shown in the menu bar.

commands.name: menubar
commands.title: Badger
commands.description: Show badger in the menu bar.

preferences.name: total
preferences.label: Enable Total Count
preferences.description: Choose whether to show the total badge count in the menu bar.

preferences.name: disableInactive
preferences.label: Disable Closed Applications
preferences.description: Choose whether to hide applications that are not currently opened.

preferences.name: attn
preferences.label: Enable Attention Dots
preferences.description: Choose whether to show attention dot badges.

preferences.name: attnDot
preferences.title: Attention Dot
preferences.description: Choose a character to use as the attention dot.

preferences.name: color
preferences.title: Idle Color
preferences.description: Choose the color to use when no badges are present in the Dock.

preferences.name: activeColor
preferences.title: Activated Color
preferences.description: Choose the color used when one or more badges are present in the Dock.
